group_1.textRight: Princess Tsuyu… Like I said before, if we@befriend her, we could stop the Demons!

group_1.textLeft: Are you saying that's the solution?!@I'll need your help!

group_1.textRight: I heard things were getting violent in the West,@so I came to check things out.
I can't believe you all would turn on each other;@your own family, your own people!

group_1.textLeft: There's a good reason for this, I swear!

group_1.textRight: I don't care about your reason,@I'm just telling it like it is.

group_1.textLeft: This wasn't our intention! If anything,@we were trying to stop the carnage!

group_1.textRight: If that's all you can say, your fancy title@doesn't stand for much.

group_1.textLeft: Ngh…

group_1.textRight: I expected more from the Battle Shamaness@of the West…
If we can't calm them down,@won't the story go awry…?!

group_1.textLeft: Okay, then!
Let's use this situation to our advantage@and win Chizuru over!

group_1.textRight: Eh? W-what are you going to do?

group_1.textLeft: There's nothing that we can do to stop@this disaster.
I'm going to ask Chizuru to help us!

group_1.textRight: We're all frustrated by this situation,@maybe she feels the same way…

group_1.textLeft: Yep! The possibility might be slim to none,@but I'm gonna give it a shot anyway!

group_1.textRight: Listen to me, Chizuru!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? …Who are you?
It's okay, Tsuruno. I'm not going to force you@to do this.

group_1.textRight: W-what do you mean?!

group_1.textLeft: I can tell that you can't find it in yourself@to be friends with her.
Besides, this girl is the root of all evil,@using Demons as her pawns!
The very same beings we've been trying@to vanquish for hundreds of years.

group_1.textRight: That's not what I was going to say, but…
I don't care what you think of the Taito Gang.
However, I'm going to be very clear here.
The Taito Gang will never open its doors@to you!
Chizuru…!
If you don't have the will to fight this disaster,@do whatever you want until it crushes you.
Or just close your gates like us, so you don't@have to deal with others anymore.

group_1.textLeft: Don't try to make it sound easy.
The Mizuna Clan and Sango were able to work@hand-in-hand until the Sumiya came along!

group_1.textRight: And the Taito Gang could as well.@You might have called us allies, even.

group_1.textLeft: Stop spouting those disgusting lies!

group_1.textRight: Whatever, I'm going to leave now.

group_1.textLeft: Uwaaaah…I totally screwed up…
Am I changing history?!@What if this messes up the future?!

group_1.textRight: I think you're probably still fine.@I'm not seeing any changes in the book.

group_1.textLeft: Tsuruno. Sana.

group_1.textRight: Y-yes!

group_1.textLeft: Could you help me dig some graves…?
Those who escaped likely won't be returning.@I want to properly mourn their loved ones.

group_1.textRight: Of course…

group_1.textLeft: Thank you…@I'm sorry you have to do this…
